attributes.action: APOLOGY FOR ABUSE TO ADULTS AND CHILDREN IN CARE
attributes.additional_details:
Calling on the British Parliament to urge the British Government to

1.Have the moral courage to apologise to all those abused under their care whilst formally being looked after by them
2.To extend the same same courtesy they gave in their apology to migrant children
3.To take the same stance as Ireland, Scotland,Canada and Australia and  offer a full  apology.
4.To respect how significant an apology is in helping the recovery process of victims and survivors.
